chapters.title: Chapter 26: The Dedicated
chapters.info: Tomada, p. 433 (386)—Ogier present at the seedsinging during Rand's eighth step through the columns of Rhuidean. He asked the soldier what the news was, and he told him that Lews Therin Telamon and the Hundred Companions had resealed the Dark One's prison with the Forsaken inside.
